tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TransportationEmissions (
  partner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  partner_name VARCHAR(255),
  emission_date DATE,
  emission_type VARCHAR(50),
  emission_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE emissions_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    partner_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    emission_type VARCHAR(50),
    emission_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (partner_id) REFERENCES logistics_partners(partner_id)
);
